data.title: REMINDER AND CONFIRMATION OF ADVISORY SUBCOMMITTEE MEETING DATES AND TIMES
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: The Cannabis Advisory Committee will be holding a series of Subcommittee Meetings on Tuesday, February 13 in Sacramento.

content.rendered:
The Cannabis Advisory Committee will be holding a series of Subcommittee Meetings on Tuesday, February 13 in Sacramento.

Ten Subcommittees will meet to discuss and develop recommendations to the state cannabis licensing authorities’ formal rulemaking packages. The agenda and meeting materials for each Subcommittee Meeting can be found here. All Subcommittee Meetings are open to the public.

MEETING TIMES AND LOCATIONS: All Subcommittees will meet at the Sheraton Grand Hotel (1230 J Street). Below are the times and room location of each Subcommittee:

9:00 AM

Enforcement Subcommittee – Bataglieri Room

Manufacturers Subcommittee – Beavis Room (Please note the updated time**)

Microbusiness Subcommittee – Bondi Room

Retailers Subcommittee – Compagno Room

Testing Laboratories Subcommittee – Falor Room

1:00 PM

Cultivators Subcommittee – Compagno Room

Distributors Subcommittee – Bondi Room

Equity Subcommittee – Beavis Room

Licensing Application Subcommittee – Falor Room

Public Health and Youth Subcommittee – Bataglieri Room

The Cannabis Advisory Committee advises the Bureau and the other licensing authorities – the California Department of Food and Agriculture and the California Department of Public Health – on the development of regulations that help protect public health and safety and reduce the illegal market for cannabis.

For additional information about the Cannabis Advisory Committee, or to subscribe to email alerts to hear about updates as they become available, please visit the Bureau’s website at http://www.bcc.ca.gov/.

For information on all three state licensing authorities, please visit the state’s California Cannabis Portal at /. Follow the Bureau on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram for daily news and updates.
